attributes.action: allow law-abiding people to carry a knife
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: in this time of high crime and a increase of armed attacks on the public, by people who use knife/guns despit the current laws which only stop law abiding people defending themselves. i ask that the carrying of a knife for the use as a self defence tool, is made lawful, and that thoughs who use knives to commit a crime are propely punished. the people of this country must be allowed to defened themselves. and not punished for carrying the means to do so.
